about_the_game:
Welcome aboard, brave souls of the Celestial Rescuers! Planets are faltering, their inhabitants facing peril, and the very fabric of their societies coming undone. Countless planets await our aid. As we journey through the stars, our directive remains: harness resources, extend a lifeline, and embody hope.

The future of our universe is in your hand!

Celestial Rescuers 2: Zero Mission is a singleplayer space action game. You jump in the seat as one of the many prestigious heros of this trans-galactic humanitarian aid taskforce. Fight for freedom and peace by helping all planets in a galaxy with various tasks such as fighting off space pirates. After you took a trip to each of the various planets in a galaxy, jump into a wormhole, receive upgrades to your ship and systems and travel to the next galaxy, with even more planets to help and tougher challenges to master.

Each time you are able to successfully help a planets inhabitants, you will receive prestige and climb towards higher and more prestigious ranks within the Celestial Rescuer program, granting you more dangerous but also more rewarding missions and customization options for your ship and stats.

Infinite Playability

Dive into endless fun with challenges that escalate in difficulty. The more you play, the tougher it gets!

Upgrades

Power up your gameplay with 12 dynamic upgrades, including 7 that can stack to maximize your strategy.

SteamDeck/Controller Support

Enjoy seamless play on-the-go or at home with full SteamDeck and controller support. Your game, your choice.

Unlockables

Ascend through the ranks to unlock exclusive ship skins and permanent upgrades. Show off your progress with style!
